Title: Prohibits the sale and distribution of anti-fogging sprays or wipes containing perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances
Summary: Prohibits the sale and distribution of anti-fogging sprays or wipes containing perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances; provides penalties for violations.
LawCode: Add ยง37-0125, amd ยง71-3703, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the sale and distribution of anti-fogging sprays or wipes containing perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances
